comment.author: 51884351@N02
comment._content:
The Sydney Morning Herald Wednesday 22 August 1894
THE GRETA COLLIERIES.
GRETA, TUESDAY.
Great anxiety is felt regarding the result of the tendering for the Greta collieries property. Tenders closed to-day. A large number of miners are still here in the hope of the pit starting work again.
